name: You Had One Job (MisplacedText, Potatobrainz, ollies-outies, ProfSplosion, lloinng)
name_original: You Had One Job (MisplacedText, Potatobrainz, ollies-outies, ProfSplosion, lloinng)
description:
This is a game about trying to do your job. But you don't exactly know what your job is.

WASD for movement

E to interact

Currently no way to "win" but the answer of what you should be giving to the customers is in the ReadME_Answers.txt file.
